name: Kayla Miller
title: Budtender
coverLetter: I have three years’ experience in retail as a cashier and customer service representative. I have experience working in the fast food industry. By nature, I’m Self-motivated. I’m a creative thinker, and highly talented. I’m determined to advance in my career by completing college majoring in psychology. I’m dependable, reliable and a flexible team player.
